structure.unit: Jurisdiction And Emblems Of The Commonwealth, The General Court, Statutes And Public Documents

law.text: [ Text of section effective until January 1, 2013. Repealed by 2012, 165, Sec. 7. See 2012, 165, Sec. 137.] The bureau shall assist the members of the general court and any committee and recess commission thereof in all matters requiring statistical research or fact-finding in connection with proposed legislation or other matters pertaining to the functions of the general court.
